meanings.sent1: The old phone started revibrating on the table.

meanings.sent3: The toy robot kept revibrating every time it hit a wall.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the concert kept revibrating in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The echo in the canyon made the sound revibrating endlessly.
